Specimen Type: Whole blood, amniotic fluid, cerebrospinal fluid, placental tissue, bronchoalveolar lavage, biopsy specimens
Purpose: To detect Toxoplasma gondii DNA in clinical specimens using polymerase chain reaction.
Container: Sterile, leak-proof container appropriate for the specific specimen type
Equipment: Real-time PCR thermocycler, Class II biosafety cabinet, micropipettes, centrifuge, refrigerators/freezers
